title: android.permission.SEND_SMS
info: Allows application to send SMS messages. Malicious applications may cost you money by sending messages without your confirmation.

title: android.permission.SEND_SMS_NO_CONFIRMATION
info: send SMS messages via the Messaging app with no user input or confirmation

title: android.permission.CALL_PHONE
info: Allows the application to call phone numbers without your intervention. Malicious applications may cause unexpected calls on your phone bill. Note that this does not allow the application to call emergency numbers.

title: android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS
info: Allows application to receive and process SMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

title: android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS
info: Allows application to receive and process MMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

title: android.permission.READ_SMS
info: Allows application to read SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications may read your confidential messages.

title: android.permission.WRITE_SMS
info: Allows application to write to SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications may delete your messages.

title: android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH
info: Allows application to receive and process WAP messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

title: android.permission.READ_CONTACTS
info: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

title: android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS
info: Allows an application to modify the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to erase or modify your contact data.

title: android.permission.READ_PROFILE
description: read the user's personal profile data
info: Allows an application to read the user's personal profile data.

title: android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE
description: write the user's personal profile data
info: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's personal profile data.

title: android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM
description: read from the user's social stream
info: Allows an application to read from the user's social stream.

title: android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM
info: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's social stream data.

title: android.permission.READ_CALENDAR
info: Allows an application to read all of the calendar events stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your calendar events to other people.

title: android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR
description: add or modify calendar events and send emails to guests
info: Allows an application to add or change the events on your calendar, which may send emails to guests. Malicious applications can use this to erase or modify your calendar events or to send emails to guests.

title: android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY
info: Allows an application to read any private words, names and phrases that the user may have stored in the user dictionary.

title: android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY
info: Allows an application to write new words into the user dictionary.

title: android.permission.READ_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS
info: Allows the application to read all the URLs that the browser has visited and all of the browser's bookmarks.

title: android.permission.WRITE_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS
info: Allows an application to modify the browser's history or bookmarks stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to erase or modify your browser's data.

title: android.permission.SET_ALARM
info: Allows the application to set an alarm in an installed alarm clock application. Some alarm clock applications may not implement this feature.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
info: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
info: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION
info: Create mock location sources for testing. Malicious applications can use this to override the location and/or status returned by real-location sources such as GPS or Network providers.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS
info: Access extra location provider commands. Malicious applications could use this to interfere with the operation of the GPS or other location sources.

title: android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER
description: permission to install a location provider
info: Create mock location sources for testing. Malicious applications can use this to override the location and/or status returned by real-location sources such as GPS or Network providers, or monitor and report your location to an external source.

title: android.permission.INTERNET
info: Allows an application to create network sockets.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
info: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
info: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

title: android.permission.BLUETOOTH
info: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

title: android.permission.NFC
info: Allows an application to communicate with Near-Field Communication (NFC) tags, cards and readers.

title: android.permission.USE_SIP
info: Allows an application to use the SIP service to make/receive Internet calls.

title: android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER
description: act as the Account Manager Service
info: Allows an application to make calls to Account Authenticators

title: android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS
info: Allows an application to access the list of accounts known by the phone.

title: android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS
info: Allows an application to use the account authenticator capabilities of the Account Manager, including creating accounts as well as obtaining and setting their passwords.

title: android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS
description: use the authentication credentials of an account
info: Allows an application to request authentication tokens.

title: android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS
info: Allows an application to perform operations like adding and removing accounts and deleting their password.

title: android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS
info: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

title: android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO
info: Allows application to access the audio record path.

title: android.permission.CAMERA
info: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

title: android.permission.VIBRATE
info: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

title: android.permission.FLASHLIGHT
info: Allows the application to control the flashlight.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_USB
info: Allows the application to access USB devices.

title: android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST
info: Allows the application to control various peripherals for the purpose of hardware testing.

title: android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS
info: Allows application to process outgoing calls and change the number to be dialled. Malicious applications may monitor, redirect or prevent outgoing calls.

title: android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE
info: Allows the application to control the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can switch networks, turn the phone radio on and off and the like, without ever notifying you.

title: android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE
info: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

title: android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
info: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

title: android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
info: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

title: android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS
info: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

title: android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
info: Allows an application to modify the system's secure settings data. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES
info: Allows an application to modify the Google services map. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR
info: Allows application to expand or collapse the status bar.

title: android.permission.GET_TASKS
info: Allows application to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. May allow malicious applications to discover private information about other applications.

title: android.permission.REORDER_TASKS
info: Allows an application to move tasks to the foreground and background. Malicious applications can force themselves to the front without your control.

title: android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION
info: Allows an application to change the current configuration, such as the locale or overall font size.

title: android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES
info: Allows an application to kill background processes of other applications, even if memory is not low.

title: android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES
info: Allows an application to kill background processes of other applications, even if memory is not low.

title: android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES
info: Allows an application to stop other applications forcibly.

title: android.permission.DUMP
info: Allows application to retrieve internal status of the system. Malicious applications may retrieve a wide variety of private and secure information that they should never commonly need.

title: android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW
info: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

title: android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE
info: Allows an application to change the global animation speed (faster or slower animations) at any time.

title: android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY
info: Allows an application to make parts of itself persistent, so that the system can't use it for other applications.

title: android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE
info: Allows an application to retrieve its code, data and cache sizes

title: android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS
info: Allows an application to modify your preferred applications. This can allow malicious applications to silently change the applications that are run, spoofing your existing applications to collect private data from you.

title: android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED
info: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

title: android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY
info: Allows an application to send sticky broadcasts, which remain after the broadcast ends. Malicious applications can make the phone slow or unstable by causing it to use too much memory.

title: android.permission.WAKE_LOCK
info: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

title: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER
info: Allows the application to set the system wallpaper.

title: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS
info: Allows the application to set the system wallpaper size hints.

title: android.permission.SET_TIME
info: Allows an application to change the phone's clock time.

title: android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE
info: Allows an application to change the phone's time zone.

title: android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS
info: Allows the application to mount and unmount file systems for removable storage.

title: android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS
info: Allows the application to format removable storage.

title: android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS
info: Allows the application to get information on internal storage.

title: android.permission.ASEC_CREATE
info: Allows the application to create internal storage.

title: android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY
info: Allows the application to destroy internal storage.

title: android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT
info: Allows the application to mount/unmount internal storage.

title: android.permission.ASEC_RENAME
info: Allows the application to rename internal storage.

title: android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD
info: Allows an application to disable the key lock and any associated password security. A legitimate example of this is the phone disabling the key lock when receiving an incoming phone call, then re-enabling the key lock when the call is finished.

title: android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS
info: Allows an application to read the sync settings, such as whether sync is enabled for Contacts.

title: android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS
info: Allows an application to modify the sync settings, such as whether sync is enabled for Contacts.

title: android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS
info: Allows an application to read the sync stats; e.g. the history of syncs that have occurred.

title: android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS
info: Allows an application to modify the APN settings, such as Proxy and Port of any APN.

title: android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ
info: Allows an application to receive details about the currently synced feeds.

title: android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRITE
info: Allows an application to modify your currently synced feeds. This could allow a malicious application to change your synced feeds.

title: android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE
info: Allows an application to change the state of network connectivity.

title: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE
info: Allows an application to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to configured Wi-Fi networks.

title: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE
info: Allows an application to receive packets not directly addressed to your device. This can be useful when discovering services offered nearby. It uses more power than the non-multicast mode.

title: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN
info: Allows an application to configure the local Bluetooth phone and to discover and pair with remote devices.

title: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE
info: Allows an application to free phone storage by deleting files in application cache directory. Access is usually very restricted to system process.

title: android.permission.READ_LOGS
info: Allows an application to read from the system's various log files. This allows it to discover general information about what you are doing with the phone, potentially including personal or private information.

title: android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP
info: Allows an application to turn on debugging for another application. Malicious applications can use this to kill other applications.

title: android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT
info: Allows an application to control the maximum number of processes that will run. Never needed for common applications.

title: android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH
info: Allows an application to control whether activities are always finished as soon as they go to the background. Never needed for common applications.

title: android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES
info: Allows application to request that the supplied signal be sent to all persistent processes.

title: android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC
description: read/write to resources owned by diag
info: Allows an application to read and write to any resource owned by the diag group; for example, files in /dev. This could potentially affect system stability and security. This should ONLY be used for hardware-specific diagnostics by the manufacturer or operator.

title: android.permission.STATUS_BAR
info: Allows application to disable the status bar or add and remove system icons.

title: android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE
info: Allows the application to be the status bar.

title: android.permission.FORCE_BACK
info: Allows an application to force any activity that is in the foreground to close and go back. Should never be needed for common applications.

title: android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS
info: Allows the modification of collected battery statistics. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDOW
info: Allows the creation of windows that are intended to be used by the internal system user interface. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS
info: Allows applications to create and manage their own tokens, bypassing their common Z-ordering. Should never be needed for common applications.

title: android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS
info: Allows an application to deliver its own input events (key presses, etc.) to other applications. Malicious applications can use this to take over the phone.

title: android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER
description: monitor and control all application launching
info: Allows an application to monitor and control how the system launches activities. Malicious applications may compromise the system completely. This permission is needed only for development, never for common phone usage.

title: android.permission.SHUTDOWN
info: Puts the activity manager into a shut-down state. Does not perform a complete shut down.

title: android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES
info: Prevents the user from switching to another application.

title: android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE
description: record what you type and actions that you take
info: Allows applications to watch the keys that you press even when interacting with another application (such as entering a password). Should never be needed for common applications.

title: android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD
info: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of an input method. Should never be needed for common applications.

title: android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER
info: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of wallpaper. Should never be needed for common applications.

title: android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN
info: Allows the holder to send intents to a device administrator. Should never be needed for common applications.

title: android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION
info: Allows an application to change the rotation of the screen at any time. Should never be needed for common applications.

title: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES
info: Allows an application to install new or updated Android packages. Malicious applications can use this to add new applications with arbitrarily powerful permissions.

title: android.permission.REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKAGES
description: Allows an application to request installing packages.
info: Malicious applications can use this to try and trick users into installing additional malicious packages.

title: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA
info: Allows an application to clear user data.

title: android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES
info: Allows an application to delete cache files.

title: android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES
info: Allows an application to delete Android packages. Malicious applications can use this to delete important applications.

title: android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE
info: Allows an application to move application resources from internal to external media and vice versa.

title: android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE
info: Allows an application to change whether or not a component of another application is enabled. Malicious applications can use this to disable important phone capabilities. It is important to be careful with permission, as it is possible to bring application components into an unusable, inconsistent or unstable state.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGER
info: Allows application to use SurfaceFlinger low-level features.

title: android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER
info: Allows application to read the content of the frame buffer.

title: android.permission.BRICK
info: Allows the application to disable the entire phone permanently. This is very dangerous.

title: android.permission.REBOOT
info: Allows the application to force the phone to reboot.

title: android.permission.DEVICE_POWER
info: Allows the application to turn the phone on or off.

title: android.permission.FACTORY_TEST
info: Run as a low-level manufacturer test, allowing complete access to the phone hardware. Only available when a phone is running in manufacturer test mode.

title: android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED
info: Allows an application to broadcast a notification that an application package has been removed. Malicious applications may use this to kill any other application running.

title: android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS
info: Allows an application to broadcast a notification that an SMS message has been received. Malicious applications may use this to forge incoming SMS messages.

title: android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH
info: Allows an application to broadcast a notification that a WAP-PUSH message has been received. Malicious applications may use this to forge MMS message receipt or to replace the content of any web page silently with malicious variants.

title: android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR
info: Allows an application to completely reset the system to its factory settings, erasing all data, configuration and installed applications.

title: android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED
info: Allows the application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without your intervention. Malicious applications may place unnecessary and illegal calls to emergency services.

title: android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIONING
info: Allows the application to start CDMA provisioning. Malicious applications may start CDMA provisioning unnecessarily

title: android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES
info: Allows enabling/disabling location update notifications from the radio. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES
info: Allows read/write access to properties uploaded by the check-in service. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS
info: Allows the modification of collected component usage statistics. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.BATTERY_STATS
info: Allows the modification of collected battery statistics. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.BACKUP
description: control system back up and restore
info: Allows the application to control the system's back-up and restore mechanism. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET
info: Allows the application to tell the system which widgets can be used by which application. With this permission, applications can give access to personal data to other applications. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DATA_SETTING
info: Allows an application to change the background data usage setting.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYSTEM
info: Allows an application to read and write the cache file system.

title: android.permission.COPY_PROTECTED_DATA
description: Allows to invoke default container service to copy content. Not for use by common applications.
info: Allows to invoke default container service to copy content. Not for use by common applications.

title: android.permission.C2D_MESSAGE
info: Allows the application to receive push notifications.

title: android.permission.ADD_VOICEMAIL
info: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.

title: android.permission.ACCEPT_HANDOVER
info: Allows a calling app to continue a call which was started in another app.  An example is a video calling app that wants to continue a voice call on the user's mobile network.

title: android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_POLICY
info: Marker permission for applications that wish to access notification policy.

title: android.permission.ANSWER_PHONE_CALLS
info: Allows the app to answer an incoming phone call.

title: android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE
info: Must be required by an AccessibilityService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_AUTOFILL_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a AutofillService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_SERVICE
info: The system process that is allowed to bind to services in carrier apps will have this permission.

title: android.permission.BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES
info: The system process that is allowed to bind to services in carrier apps will have this permission. Carrier apps should use this permission to protect their services that only the system is allowed to bind to.

title: android.permission.BIND_CHOOSER_TARGET_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a ChooserTargetService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it

title: android.permission.BIND_CONDITION_PROVIDER_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a ConditionProviderService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it

title: android.permission.BIND_DREAM_SERVICE
info: Must be required by an DreamService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_INCALL_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a InCallService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_MIDI_DEVICE_SERVICE
info: Must be required by an MidiDeviceService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_NFC_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a HostApduService or OffHostApduService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE
info: Must be required by an NotificationListenerService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a PrintService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_QUICK_SETTINGS_TILE
info: Allows an application to bind to third party quick settings tiles.

title: android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS
info: Must be required by a RemoteViewsService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_SCREENING_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a CallScreeningService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_TELECOM_CONNECTION_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a ConnectionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a TextService (e.g. SpellCheckerService) to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_TV_INPUT
info: Must be required by a TvInputService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_VISUAL_VOICEMAIL_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a link

title: android.permission.BIND_VOICE_INTERACTION
info: Must be required by a VoiceInteractionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE
info: Must be required by a VpnService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BIND_VR_LISTENER_SERVICE
info: Must be required by an VrListenerService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

title: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED
info: Allows applications to pair bluetooth devices without user interaction, and to allow or disallow phonebook access or message access. This is not available to third party applications.

title: android.permission.BODY_SENSORS
info: Allows an application to access data from sensors that the user uses to measure what is happening inside his/her body, such as heart rate.

title: android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT
info: Allows an application to capture audio output.

title: android.permission.CAPTURE_SECURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT
info: Allows an application to capture secure video output.

title: android.permission.CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT
info: Allows an application to capture video output.

title: android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE
info: Allows a regular application to use

title: android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS_PRIVILEGED
info: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.

title: android.permission.INSTALL_SHORTCUT
info: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.

title: android.permission.INSTANT_APP_FOREGROUND_SERVICE
info: Allows an instant app to create foreground services.

title: android.permission.LOCATION_HARDWARE
info: Allows an application to use location features in hardware, such as the geofencing api.

title: android.permission.MANAGE_DOCUMENTS
info: Allows an application to manage access to documents, usually as part of a document picker.

title: android.permission.MANAGE_OWN_CALLS
info: Allows a calling application which manages it own calls through the self-managed

title: android.permission.MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL
info: Allows an application to know what content is playing and control its playback.

title: android.permission.NFC_TRANSACTION_EVENT
info: Allows applications to receive NFC transaction events.

title: android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG
info: Allows an application to read the user's call log.

title: android.permission.READ_PHONE_NUMBERS
info: Allows read access to the device's phone number(s). This is a subset of the capabilities granted by

title: android.permission.READ_VOICEMAIL
info: Allows an application to read voicemails in the system.

title: android.permission.REQUEST_COMPANION_RUN_IN_BACKGROUND
info: Allows a companion app to run in the background.

title: android.permission.REQUEST_COMPANION_USE_DATA_IN_BACKGROUND
info: Allows a companion app to use data in the background.

title: android.permission.REQUEST_DELETE_PACKAGES
info: Allows an application to request deleting packages. Apps targeting APIs

title: android.permission.REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS
info: Permission an application must hold in order to use

title: android.permission.SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESSAGE
info: Allows an application (Phone) to send a request to other applications to handle the respond-via-message action during incoming calls.

title: android.permission.TRANSMIT_IR
info: Allows using the device's IR transmitter, if available.

title: android.permission.UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT
info: Don't use this permission in your app. This permission is no longer supported.

title: android.permission.USE_BIOMETRIC
info: Allows an app to use device supported biometric modalities.

title: android.permission.USE_FINGERPRINT
info: This constant was deprecated in API level 28. Applications should request USE_BIOMETRIC instead

title: android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG
info: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's call log data.

title: android.permission.WRITE_VOICEMAIL
info: Allows an application to modify and remove existing voicemails in the system.
